quote: But undying memories stood like sentinels in her breast. When the notes of doves, calling to each other, fell on her ear, her eyes sought the sky, and she heard a voice saying, ""Majella!
quote_letters: BUT UNDYING MEMORIES STOOD LIKE SENTINELS IN HER BREAST WHEN THE NOTES OF DOVES CALLING TO EACH OTHER FELL ON HER EAR HER EYES SOUGHT THE SKY AND SHE HEARD A VOICE SAYING MAJELLA
